Name: Ayahuasca: Polyventure
About the game: Ayahuasca: Polyventure is a low poly adventure game based on beautiful atmospheres and lucid dreaming, to concern about endangered species and the enviroment. The game mainly consists to explore and feel the surrounding environment of a fantastic world. A magnificent experimental game made to delight your sensory system.
